com.jenjinstudios.io.connection

Class ConnectionBuilder<T extends ExecutionContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jenjinstudios.io.connection.ConnectionBuilder<T>

extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass for connection builders.

        Returns:
        The built Connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error retrieving input and output streams from the Socket.

      • withContextualTasks

        public ConnectionBuilder<T> withContextualTasks(java.util.function.Consumer<T>... tasks)
        Build a connection that includes the given contextual task to be executed synchronously with message execution.
        Parameters:
        tasks - The task(s) to be executed; Consumers accepting an ExecutionContext.
        Returns:
        This ConnectionBuilder.

      • withRecurringTasks

        public ConnectionBuilder<T> withRecurringTasks(RecurringTask<T>... tasks)
        Build a connection that include the given recurring tasks; these tasks are executed synchronously with message execution, and at regular (although undefined) intervals.

        These tasks are likely to be executed very frequently (on the order of 100 times per second) so they should be kept as short as possible.

        It also should be noted that there is no way to "cancel" one of these tasks.

        Parameters:
        tasks - The tasks to be executed repeatedly.
        Returns:
        This ConnectionBuilder.

      • withShutdownCallbacks

        public ConnectionBuilder<T> withShutdownCallbacks(java.util.function.Consumer<Connection<T>>... callbacks)
        Build a connection that includes the given contextual task to be executed synchronously with message execution.
        Parameters:
        callbacks - The task(s) to be executed; Consumers accepting a Connection.
        Returns:
        This ConnectionBuilder.

      • withExecutionContextFactory

        public ConnectionBuilder<T> withExecutionContextFactory(ExecutionContextFactory<T> context)
        Build a connection with the given ExecutionContext.
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the Connection will execute messages.
        Returns:
        This ConnectionBuilder
